sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Israel's government under pressure to resume negotiations with Hamas after its soldiers mistakenly shoot three hostages dead in Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Russian Defense Ministry has reported it shot down at least 32 Ukrainian drones over occupied Crimea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Maloney hosts an anti-migration festival attended by Elon Musk and British leader Rishi Sunak.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In Tel Aviv, people rallied to mourn the three Israeli hostages mistakenly shot dead by Israeli soldiers in Gaza and a fourth hostage who was confirmed to have died there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: to have died there. The rally then heard from Raz Ben Ami, an Israeli who had been held hostage by Hamas and whose husband, Ohad Ben Ami, still is.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Military action on its own won't save the hostages' lives, she told the rally.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Swapping the hostages for prisoners is urgent and it's critical.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Many Israelis are wondering how the three hostages, all young men in their 20s, could be killed by soldiers when they were waving white flags.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: All the military can say is that the soldiers were under pressure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And now, Benjamin Netanyahu's government is also under pressure to resume negotiations with Hamas over swapping more Palestinian prisoners, the remaining 129 hostages still being held in Gaza. The Russian Defense Ministry has reported that at least 32 Ukrainian drones were shot down over the occupied Crimea in the late hours of Friday night and early Saturday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Social media users tell about explosions as well as in Geneshevsk, a town just north of crimea also occupied by russian forces no casualties or damages have been reported so far meanwhile ukraine reported fresh russian attacks on kerson mikulayev and kiev Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky earlier visited Lviv in western Ukraine to pay tribute to fallen soldiers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He also took the time to meet friends and families of fallen Ukrainians. A Vatican tribunal has convicted a cardinal of embezzling millions of euros and sentenced

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: him to five and a half years in prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Seventy-five-year-old Cardinal Angelo Bettu was once a close adviser to Pope Francis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He then became the first cardinal to ever be prosecuted by the Vatican's criminal court in a trial that lasted two and a half years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Bettu was just one of ten officials that were prosecuted, lifting the lid on some of the city-state's murky financial dealings. It's also raised questions about the rule of law in the Vatican and Francis's power as absolute monarch.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The EU Commissioner for Home Affairs Yllva Johansson, has visited the Canary Islands to reassure them they are not alone in tackling the migration crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The number of migrants arriving on the shores of the islands this year has broken records.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Most of the arrivals hail from Senegal, Mauritania and Morocco.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The route from the African continent to the islands is believed to be more dangerous than crossing the Mediterranean Sea, where the vast majority of migrant deaths are recorded.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Maloney is hosting a right-wing festival in Rome with immigration high on her agenda.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Italy is trying to get Albania to take in most of its migrants and have any asylum applications they make processed there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Albanian President Eddie Rama has cautioned that it won't stop migration from Africa to Europe, however.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Whilst Maloney wants migrants processed in Albania, the U.K.'s Prime Minister, Rishi Sunak, wants them processed much further away in Rwanda.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Sunak has claimed that migrants could overwhelm countries such as Italy and the UK.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And the US billionaire Elon Musk also had an anti-migration message for the festival.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He said immigration cannot solve the demographic problem that many major economic powers such as Italy and Japan are facing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The answer, he said, was for families to have more children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And to drive home his point, he carried one of his sons onto the stage.
